content.question: Which of the following best describes a historianâ€™s likely interpretation of the situation in which the excerpt was produced in the early 1800s?

choices.label: Political leaders agreed on policies for developing the economy.
Most Americans sought to turn away from European influences.
Some Americans promoted international strength through a unified national economy.
Business leaders argued that the Constitution limited federal spending.

content.answer: Some Americans promoted international strength through a unified national economy.

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
